br.edu.metrocamp.chess.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.edu.metrocamp.chess.board.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    Board class defines a chess board and implements it's functions.
    Author:
    Lucas, Fabi, Vini, Marcos, Adailton
